title: Clients â€” Add in-context Mood Board and Shoot buttons
description: Add 'Create Mood Board for this client' button within the mood board section of client detail. Add 'Schedule Shoot' button within the shoots section. Both auto-populate the client context.
acceptanceCriteria: 'Create Mood Board for this client' button in mood board section
Client ID auto-populated when navigating to mood board or schedule

steps.details: In the client detail mood board section, add a Button that links to /admin/moodboard/new?client_id=[clientId] (or equivalent). Use the client's ID from the page context.
In the client detail shoots section, add a Button that opens the schedule shoot modal with the client pre-selected. Pass client_id as a prop or URL param.
Ensure the target pages/modals read the client_id param and pre-select the client. No need for the user to re-select from a list.
Use secondary/outline Button variant to match the section context. Consistent sizing and placement within each section block.

technicalNotes: Check if mood board creation already supports a client_id query param
ScheduleShootsModal may already accept a preselected client prop
